did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: The former Dean of the New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations collection of plaques, paper weights, book ends, and other memorabilia.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations --Faculty.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Martin P. Catherwood Memorabilia #/3025 MB. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
relatedmaterial.p:
Related Collections:
/3025: Martin P. Catherwood Papers
/4041: Catherwood, Martin P. Papers. Additional.
/4052: Catherwood, Martin P. Papers. Additional.
/4198 MB: Catherwood, Martin P. Academic Robe, Hood and Cap. Additional Memorabilia.
/4292m: Catherwood, Martin P. Framed Letter to Joseph Raffel

did.unittitle: Desk box/paper weight from IBM Factory Organizations

scopecontent.p: engraved with "Compliments of IBM Factory Organizations, Dr. M.P. Catherwood" -- silver with etchings on top of cover and inside of cover of IBM buildings

did.unittitle: Medal and lapel pin engraved with "Paul Harris Fellow"

scopecontent.p: gold coin with profile of a man, both inside a blue velvet covered box

did.unittitle: Bronze souvenir with Ezra Cornell and the clock tower on the front

scopecontent.p: on the back engraving reads: "Presented by the Board of Trustees of Cornell University to Martin P. Catherwood With Warm Appreciation For His Great Contribution to Cornell as a Trustee, 1941-1947, 1959-1970 in a black case with red velvet lining

wooden plaque with engraving "Good Government Award Presented To Hon. Martin P. Catherwood, Industrial Commissioner, Dept. of Labor, State of New York by the New York State Careerists Society, Inc. In Acknowledgment and Appreciation of His Distinguished Contributions to the Efficient Operations of a Major Unit of Government in the Fields of Public Administration and Democratic Employee Relations. Fifth Anniversary Breakfast, October 7th, 1962

wooden plaque with bronze scroll and engraving - "IAGLO to Dr. Martin P. Catherwood in Grateful Recognition of Services to the International Association of Governmental Labor Officials as President 1965-1966"
gold with engraving "Christmas 1968" ; and the 'Great Seal of the State of New York'
round, gold desk clock made by Tiffany & Co.

engraved on both sides - side 1-'New York State Pavilion-New York World's Fair, 1964-1965' ; side 2-'The Great Seal of the State of New York' ; enclosed in a navy blue box with the etching 'to M.P.C. from N.A.R. Christmas 1964'
2 gold blocks one with engraving - "M.P.C. from N.A.R., Christmas 1967 ; also includes 'The Great Seal of the State of New York'; one plain, no engraving

did.unittitle: Award from the Nassau-Suffolk Legislative Clearing House

scopecontent.p: Bronze plaque mounted on wood. "In Grateful Appreciation . . . For Notable Contributions to the Favorable Economic Climate of the State". January 14, 1960.

did.unittitle: Tompkins County United Way Distinguished Service Award

scopecontent.p: For work as the 1973 Campaign Chairman
